1: -module(sockapp_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -export([all/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2, can_receive_state/1, can_enter_tcp_clause/1]).
    5: 
    6: suite()->
    7:     [{port,8300}].
    8: init_per_suite(Config)->
    9:     Config.
   10: 
   11: end_per_suite(Config)->
   12:     ok.
   13: 
   14: init_per_testcase(Case,Config)->
   15:     % application:start(sockapp),
   16:     Config.
   17: end_per_testcase(Case,Config)->
   18:     % application:stop(sockapp),
   19:     ok.
   20: 
   21: 
   22: all()->
   23:     [
   24:         can_receive_state,
   25:         can_enter_tcp_clause
   26:         
   27:     ].
   28: 
   29: can_receive_state(Config)->
   30:     Message=state,
   31:     Port=proplists:get_value(port, Config),
   32:     ct:pal("Port is ~p",[Port]),
   33:     CData=init_client(Port),
   34:     
   35:     Pid = proplists:get_value(pid, CData).
   36:     
   37:     % ?assertMatch({state, _Socket,[],[],[]}, gen_server:call(Pid,Message)).
   38: 
   39: can_enter_tcp_clause(Config)->
   40:     Message=state,
   41:     
   42:     CData=init_client(?config(port,Config)),
   43:     Pid = proplists:get_value(pid, CData),
   44:     ?assertMatch({state,_Socket,[],[],[]}, gen_server:call(Pid,Message)),
   45:     NewMessage=count,
   46:     Pid ! {tcp,ign,NewMessage},
   47:     ?assertMatch({state,_Socket,[count],[],[]}, gen_server:call(Pid,state)).
   48: 
   49: 
   50: 
   51: init_client(Port)->
   52:     {ok,Socket}=gen_tcp:connect("localhost", Port, []),
   53:     {ok,Pid}=sock_worker:start_link(Socket,3),
   54:     [{socket,Socket},{pid,Pid}].
   55:
